content: {"id": "6fe2a02d-ad09-495b-93bf-37aec4e83c84", "name": "Chapelstreet Church - Shepherd's Heart - Food Pantry", "alternate_name": "", "description": "We are committed to supporting individuals and families in need through a variety of services. We offer financial assistance for those who qualify, as well as a food pantry during designated hours. In addition, we provide a dinner service every Monday & Thursday evening during food pantry hours. Our legal clinic offers free legal assistance, and our Financial Wellness Team provides guidance and resources to improve financial stability. We also offer job coaching to help individuals prepare for and secure employment.  Additionally, we have recently introduced a Baby Bank, which provides essential baby items for children from newborn to 2 years old. Families can access this resource by bringing their baby along with a birth certificate to verify eligibility.  We welcome anyone in need to come and receive assistance, and encourage those who qualify to take advantage of our services.", "email": "foodpantry@chapelstreetchurch.com", "url": "", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "", "address_2": "", "city": "", "state_province": "", "postal_code": "", "country": "US"}, "phones": [{"number": "(630)232-7068", "type": "voice"}], "location": {"latitude": 41.882714, "longitude": -88.3372223}, "regular_schedule": []}
